name: Modulo operator
content: Returns the remainder of a division problem.

examples.name: Odd or Even?
examples.description: One common use for modulo is to determine if a value is odd or even.

palette_params.name: x
palette_params.description: The dividend of the division, the number being divided.

palette_params.name: y
palette_params.description: The divisor of the division, the number x is being divided by.

return_value: The remainder of the division x / y
